articles.title: 'American Idol' 2024 winner revealed: Abi Carter takes the crown as Katy Perry departs - USA TODAY
articles.description: Abi Carter beat out Jack Blocker and Will Moseley to win "American Idol" Season 22, which marks Katy Perry's last. Here's what happened in the finale.
articles.content:
"American Idol" has crowned another winner.

articles.title: UN Authorizes Second Shot to Fight Dengue in Americas - VOA Learning English
articles.description: The World Health Organization recently authorized a second dengue vaccine. The move could protect millions of people worldwide against the mosquito-borne disease.
articles.content:
